question: You have been offered a job that will require you to move to a city that you have never visited before. You have a friend who lives there. Write a letter to your friend. In your letter, Explain your situation, Say why you feel unsure about living in the city Ask some questions about life in the city.
text: I hope you are well. I just received wonderful news about the job which I attended an interview for last week. I was approved for the manager role that I've been aiming it for a long time. I'm excited about this opportunity, however, I need to move from Florianópolis to your city São Paulo.

Changing city makes me feel insecure because I have never lived in another city than Florianópolis. I heard that São Paulo has high numbers of violence in some regions and the public transportation is not so good. As you know, I don't have a driver licence, so I really need to count on quick and safe transportation between my home and work, otherwise, I'll need to live near to the downtown.

Do you know if the Recreio neighbourhood is near to Downtown? I was looking for apartments to live in this area. Do you know if this place is safe, even at night? In this new job, I believe it will be necessary to make extra work hours and I don't want to be in danger while returning home.
Thank you in advance for providing me with all this information.
